message: Let's split it 60/40. A fair deal to start.
Your 60/40 split seems a little off to me. How about we go 55/45?
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more than that.  58/42 is my final offer.
This is a tough negotiation Alice! I'm willing to meet in the middle at 54/46.  Let's get this done before inflation eats away at the value.
